name: Blackboard Apocalypse
description:
Command a ship and defend the blackboard against hordes of evil chalk invaders!

Win points, get upgrades and annihilate them all!

Can you do it?

Highlights:

  • Fast and fun shooter gameplay!
  • Infinite waves of enemies!
  • Buy upgrades and make your ship even more powerful!
  • Retro 8-bit style soundtrack!
  • Progressive dificulty adjusted automatically!
  • Google Play achievements and Leaderboards!
  • Suitable for all ages!
  • Totally free!
